name: Dark Star (Lost Generation Games)
description:
Take on the role of a independent space-wayfarer who escorts important clientele through dangerous areas... IN SPACE. Includes 2 player co-op space shooting action!

---CONTROLS---

GAMEPADS ARE RECOMMENDED

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

SPACE - advance dialogue

PLAYER 1:

Q/W - Thrust

A/S - Reverse

C - Shoot

PLAYER 2

O/P - Thrust

K/L - Reverse

Forward Slash - Shoot

---CREDITS---

Mark 'Arity' Willson  -  Game Design, Engineering,  Programming, Additional Art

Mana Dream  -  Art, Music, and Sound Design, Additional Programming, Game Design
